channel.title: Client Jdk help
channel.description:
Hey I havn't posted on this forum very much but I have been looking through it a lot for tips and tricks. I need some help. I have made my server and managed to get it online. the only problem is when I send ppl the client that have to edit the run batch file to their specific jdk type becaue when they try to run it it says "system cannot find the path specified".
How I can make the client so that the run works will most peoples java instead of everyone having to edit the run. is there a way of doing this??? what if I make a .jar file for the client??
Long question short: can I make the client run on most peoples java.

item.title: Client Jdk help
item.dc:creator: @Dr_Jig Dr Jig
item.description:
@Dr_Jig wrote:

Hey I havn’t posted on this forum very much but I have been looking through it a lot for tips and tricks. I need some help.
